content: the atlanticus pattern is written to make a 145cm x 145cm blanket it uses us terminology and is worked in rounds skill level -intermediate **material list ** * double knit dk cotton or acrylic yarn * i used dk cotton * 4mm hook * needle for sewing in ends you are more than welcome to work the blanket in any yarn of your choice however depending on the yarn and gauge you may have a size difference in the prelude of the pattern you will find detailed stitch tutorials yarn quantities used for both the colourways and many many more bits of useful info throughout the written pattern there are detailed photo tutorials there is also a video tutorial available to purchase see link below https //www hookedonsunshine co/atlanticus-videos/ visit our facebook group for pattern support and other info https //www facebook com/groups/1370975902929963/ yarn kits can be purchased via the hooked on sunshine site https //www hookedonsunshine co/atlanticus-cal/
